title: EEE 101
description: Basic Electrical and Electronics Engineering Multiple choice Questions (MCQ)

questions.question: What is the concept behind maximum power transfer theorem in electrical circuits.?

answers.Answer: To maximize power efficiency in a circuit
To maximize power transfer from a source to a load
To maximize power generation in a circuit
To minimize power consumption in a circuit

questions.question: What is the purpose of a Schottky diode in electronic circuits.?

answers.Answer: To protect against reverse current flow

questions.question: What is the primary function of a Field-Effect Transistor (FET) in electronic devices.?
What is the purpose of a decoupling capacitor in a power supply circuit.?
What is the significance of the Q factor in resonance circuits.?

answers.Answer: It indicates the bandwidth of the circuit
It determines the power factor of the circuit
It measures the efficiency of the circuit
It quantifies the quality of the circuit's response

questions.question: What is the concept behind electromagnetic induction.?

answers.Answer: The generation of an electric field due to a changing magnetic field
The production of a magnetic field due to an electric current
The creation of an electric potential due to a static magnetic field
The conversion of mechanical energy into electrical energy

questions.question: What is the purpose of a PID controller in control systems.?
